summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3902 for the improvement of 1st Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Duwamish Waterway, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47571, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
